strings.Value: "Ach... they knocked me around a bit today! But they got it far worse than I did."
"I got pretty thrashed today. But so did our enemies, ha, ha!"
"Still, you must be more careful, Reg... I'm the one who has to mend your clothes afterwards."
"No doubt you're good in hand-to-hand. But your defense leaves much to be desired. You can't stand long against an attack. You mustn't always push forward, but look for the better angle."
"Don't joke with death. It never jokes with anyone."
"Your courage has no rival! Truth be told, sometimes it feels not like courage, but folly..."
"You fought brave as greatbeast! For a longshanks, of course — no one more fierce than when goblins attack!"
"You exhaust yourself. – But it's your life and your death. But think about what the party would do if it lost a fighter."
"You exhaust yourself. – But it's your life and your death. But think about what the party would do if it lost a fighter."
